Actions.Name: Hungry Dead
Actions.Effects: All characters in range 2 are shoved 1 towards the [name], which could shove them inside of it.

Actions.Name: Tendrils
Actions.Description: Characters in range of the [name] are shoved 1 towards or away from it. The [name] can choose for each character. Bloodied characters are shoved 2 instead.

Actions.Name: Vomit Lightning
Actions.AreaEffect: Foes take 2 damage once for each foe in the area, up to a maximum of three times.

Combo.Name: Cacophonous Consumption
Combo.Description: Foes inside the [name] must save, then they take 5 damage, five times. If they succeed the save, they take 3 damage, five times instead.
